title: LOOKING FOR ADC, JUNGLER  and SUPPORT IN DIAMOND FOR TEAM RANKED
body:
Looking for people who are keen to play team ranked for fun and to get better. 
Feel free to add me if you are at least platinum in solo que, if you fit the roles of: Jungle, ADC and or Support.

replies.body: I'm a plat 3 support main, add me if you want to try and rank together.
Add me IGN, i have a team with 2 diam and 2 challs, we might just join forces
